page.title: 18Chapels In The Area
page.content: The chapels have all got an{Organ or {Piano}in this area. Billy Bray's chapel{Kerley Downs}is near Baldhu. Billy Bray built four chapels, one is {Kerley Downs Chapel.}Baldhu chapel is built of granite, it has a toilet outside. The chapel has a balcony and a clock room. It is heated by a gas fire. Hugus chapel has also got a gas fire. The chapel has a{Tortoise Stove} which was used in the old days. Every Sunday there is a service. There is a board on the wall where the preacher puts the numbers of the hymns. The chapel has two pianos.{Twelve Heads {Chapel}is next to the Sunday School. The chapel has two balconys one is where the choir sit and the other is for the people who come to church.
